mapper.select: select * from product order by product_num asc limit #{startRow},#{pageBlock}

select rnum, product_num, product_name, price, point , company, product_img, category, rating from (select row_number() over(order by product_num asc) as rnum, product_num, product_name, price, point , company, product_img, category, rating from product where company like #{searchWord}) as temp where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select rnum, product_num, product_name, price, point , company, product_img, category, rating from (select row_number() over(order by product_num asc) as rnum, product_num, product_name, price, point , company, product_img, category, rating from product where product_name like #{searchWord}) as temp where rnum between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select count(*) total_rows from product where company like #{searchWord}
select count(*) total_rows from product where product_name like #{searchWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (product_name, price, point, company, product_img, category) VALUES (#{product_name}, #{price}, #{point}, #{company}, #{product_img}, #{category});
